title: A1466 820-00165-A no backlight
message:
Hi,

I have an A1466 820-00165-A that has no backlight.

Already replace U7701, but with no success.

I get 8.6V on F7700 and 8.6V on D7701, but no backlight.
I get 3.3V on R7757 BKL_SDA
I get 3.3V on R7753 BKL_SCL
I get 2.8V on R7715 BKL_EN
All return resistance seams to be ok.
Can it be feedback? How to be sure?

Can you help?

title: A1466 820-00165-A no backlight
message:
I suppose you already check to confirm image is present.
It should be, as you get 8.6V at D7701.

Did you check XW7720 bridge continuity?
What about BKL_PWM level?

title: A1466 820-00165-A no backlight
message:
HI,
I do have image, but i didn't checked  XW7720  nor  BKL_PWM...

On  BKL_PWM  i have 1.46V

How can i measure XW7720  bridge continuity?

P.S. PPVOUT_SW_LCDBKLT_FB test point (near D7701) seams to be corroded.

title: A1466 820-00165-A no backlight
message: It seams that i don't have  XW7720  bridge continuity

title: A1466 820-00165-A no backlight
message: You have the solution in the second picture; if is not possible to solve it like in first pic.
